channel.title: Is it possible to make full screen interface
channel.description: My question is, is it possible to make "full screen" interface. Like what welcome screen is. If it's possible may someone point me forward/ give me tip where to search/ edit.

item.title: Is it possible to make full screen interface
item.dc:creator: @Winter_pvp Winter pvp
item.description:
@Winter_pvp wrote:

My question is, is it possible to make “full screen” interface.
Like what welcome screen is. If it’s possible may someone point me
forward/ give me tip where to search/ edit.

Read full topic
